bib.title: Are narrow-ranging species doomed to extinction? Projected dramatic decline in future climate suitability of two highly threatened species
bib.author: N. DUBOS and F. MONTFORT and C. GRINAND and M. NOURTIER and G. DESO and J.-M. PROBST and J. H. RAZAFIMANAHAKA and R. R. ANDRIANTSIMANARILAFY and E. F. RAKOTONDRASOA and P. RAZAFINDRAIBE and R. JENKINS and A. CROTTINI
